sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"结束，完成"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: complete, finish, end, close, conclude, terminate, accomplish
means: complete ： 侧重指完成预定的任务或使某事完善，补足缺少的部分等。
finish ： 与complete基本同义，着重圆满地结束或完成已着手的事。
end ： 最普通用词，着重事情的完成。也指某种活动因达到目的而自然结束或由于某种原因而突然中止。
close ： 普通用词，着重行为的终止或结束，不强调其目的。
conclude ： 正式用词，多指以某事或活动达到预期目的而告终。
terminate ： 强调有一个空间和时间的限度，届时必须终止。书面语用词。
accomplish ： 正式用词，强调一个过程的完成；也可指依靠努力达到一定目的，或取得一定的结果。

sentence.Network_en: He exhorted his companions, "Try to accomplish your aim with diligence".
sentence.Network_cn: 他劝诫同伴说：“要通过勤奋努力实现自己的目标。”

sentence.Network_en: Today I will do what others won't, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can't.--Jerry Rice
sentence.Network_cn: 今天我做了别人不愿做的事，明天我就能做到别人所不能做的事。

sentence.Network_en: He is a man who will spoil rather than accomplish things.
sentence.Network_cn: 他这个人成事不足,坏事有余.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... completion n 成就；圆满 accomplish v 成就；完成 accomplished a 有成就的，有造诣的.
3500高考英语单词_百度文库 ... accompany 陪伴，伴随；伴奏 accomplish 完成，实现 account 账目，描述.
新课标高考英语词汇表3500_百度文库 ... accompany v. 陪伴, 伴奏 accomplish v. 完成, 达到, 实现 account n. 账目; 描述.
英文字典_百度文库 ... accompany 陪同;伴奏 accomplish 实行;完成 accord 和谐;一致.

list.abs: ...Steve Ballmer)站在横幅前，上面写着“任务完成（Mission Accomplished）”。
七月十四日白色羽扇豆（White Lupin） 多才多艺（highly accomplished）（Highly Accomplished）七月十五日金盏花（Marigold） 一丝不苟 （Exact Man）  …
15.《人类成就》（Human Accomplishment）作者：查尔斯·默里有争议的《钟形曲线》一书合著者对知识的历史发表独特见解。
fact的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... n. 真情调查, 调停 accomplished fact 既成事实 after the fact 【律】犯罪之后.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French acompliss-, lengthened stem of acomplir, based on Latin ad- 'to' + complere 'to complete'

entry.def: If you accomplish something, you succeed in doing it.

example.ex: If we'd all work together, I think we could accomplish our goal...
example.tran: 只要大家齐心协力，我想我们就能实现目标。

example.ex: They are skeptical about how much will be accomplished by legislation.
example.tran: 他们对于立法成效心存疑虑。

auth_sentence.content: Focus on what you need to accomplish each day.
auth_sentence.res_content: Focus on what you need to accomplish each day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Focus on what you need to accomplish each day.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Noda, hestresses, must actually accomplish something.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Noda, hestresses, must actually accomplish something.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Noda, hestresses, must actually accomplish something.

auth_sentence.content: China is only the third country to accomplish this.
auth_sentence.res_content: China is only the third country to accomplish this.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fold,表示"重叠,重复"; 2. 折; 3. 弯; 4. =full/fill,表示"满,填满"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 详述的,明确的;坦率的;显然的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pli重叠+cit→把重叠的东西弄出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 简单的, 简易的, 朴素的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sim一次+ple=pli重叠,重复→折一次→简单

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有成就的,有才艺的;有造诣的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accomplish[v.完成]+ed……的→完成了的→有成就的
com全部+pli满,填满+ment表名词→让人十分满足
com全部+pli满,填满+ment表名词→让人十分满足
sim一次+pli折叠+ify表动词→折叠一次→简单化
ac加强+com全部+pli满+sh→全部弄满→完成

Sentence.sentence: It can only be partly accomplished now.
I'm self-employed and need the Internet for my work, but I'm failing to accomplish my work,to take care of my home, to give attention to my children," she wrote in a message sent to the group.
I see people pursuing higher paying and increasingly demanding careers to accomplish this goal.

Nonetheless, the developers of the Chinatown garage are confident with the technology and are counting on it to squeeze 67 cars in an apartment-building basement that would otherwise fit only 24, accomplished by removing a maneuver space normally required.
Understand what she's trying to accomplish and propose a Plan B that will make it happen without destroying what you've done so far.
His talent as an accomplished musician

means.word_mean: 完成, 实现, 做成功

sentences.en: My grandmother has accomplished the age of 97 years of her life.

means.word_mean: 达到(目的)；完成(任务、使命、计划、事业等)；实现(诺言、计划等)

sentences.en: This task is accomplished by great effort.
sentences.cn: 这项任务是经过巨大努力才完成的。

means.word_mean: 使完美，使圆满，使完善；使完全；使变得优雅；改善

sentences.en: There is nothing accomplishes a person more than learning
sentences.cn: 没什么比知识更会使人充实。

jushi.english: The explorer accomplished the voyage in three weeks.
jushi.chinese: 探险家在三周内完成了这次航行。

jushi.english: And the note would accomplish a dual purpose.
jushi.chinese: 这封便笺可以达到双重目的。

jushi.english: Mission accomplished. Let's go and have a drink.
jushi.chinese: 任务完成了。咱们去喝一杯吧。
